title: Large-Scale Science Research Methodology Tutorial Using Online Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Science Knowledge and Experience in Using Online Learning Platforms
context.additional_context: Students access asynchronous tutorials via personal devices (BYOD), engage in discussions and hands-on activities during offline classes, and progress is monitored through formative assessments.

learning_goals: Through online tutorials, learners can perform scientific research material search and evaluation methods with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can independently apply skills for utilizing science databases in asynchronous learning environments.
Learners experience analyzing online learning materials based on peer feedback three or more times.

resources: Access to online databases in the sciences

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
